name: Trijam 156 - Tea Ninja against coffee
description:
Play in fullscreen please The story
  • Tea or coffee? The endless debate has to stop; the war between tea and coffee has to stop -  we all know that tea is superior!
  • You play as "Tea Ninja" whose mission is to smash the mug of coffee (swooshing with his bag of green tea) while viciously being attacked by coffee beans
  • Your mission - should you chose to accept - is to destroy the last remaining cup of coffee and ensure tea is the only hot beverage left on earth
How to play
  • WASD to move
  • R to restart level
  • Move close enough to attack the coffee mug (etiher left or right mouse button for top attack or bottom attack)
  • When the evil coffee beans hit you, you feel the negative power of coffee! Making you jittery, hard to focus on your task and eventuelly you will be pushed away too far from the mug to destroy it! So be careful and hit fast and hard and try to minimize exposure to the evil coffee beans
  • Level 1 is fairly easy - the hits needed to destroy the mug are low and the beans don't push you away to hard; level 2 is a bit hard requiring more hits and beans are WAY STRONGER

Spawning beans are MEAN and should be avoided - they push you away further and further from the mug!

Time needed & credits
  • 1.5 hrs artwork
  • 1 hr coding (had to stop and google 2hrs for investigating how particle system detects collisions, realized I can't do what I want to do so turned bug into feature [beans are making you jittery and push you away - no idea why, but now it is a core feature])
  • 0.5hrs making beats for the game 
  • Font: Kemco Pixel,  by Jayvee Enaguas
